name: Eyes Of The Dice
description:
This is my first contribution to a GameJam, through it I could learn a lot. A save system didn't make it in as well as the planned UI elements and effects, but I'm still happy with the result and looking forward to the next time. Thanks a lot GMTK!

- Every eye counts! Get to the goal with the right moves.  The counter has to be zero once you reach it.

:)
